title: What if I got a skin I really wanted to buy before the restart?
body:
Okay, to start off with positivity, I am pretty happy with the skins I got after the MY SHOP restart, I will be getting Cosmic Dusk Xayah (One of few adcs I know how to play, cuz I suck at adc), and Super Galaxy Kindred (My favorite champ, ex main and I love playing them), and I think about getting Emerald Taric cuz I have the same amount of poins on Taric as on Ekko, and I am best with him as a champ at support role.
---
My question though is, even tho I got 3 skins that I will probably buy, I still got **REAPER SORAKA** on 60% discount before it was restarted, and Reaper Soraka is the only skin I ever wanted for that champ (As I mained support for a long time and I enjoy that role the most out of all for some reason, and love playing Soraka), it is a legacy skin which means you can't buy it at all, and is also the only skin I truly want when I check skins that exist, yet I am unable to buy it.
--
--
Is there any way of Riot actually giving me an opportunity to buy these 3 skins **AND** Reaper Soraka with a discount I got from the first shop? (Because I am getting RP tomorrow, didn't have it yesterday to buy it straight away)

If anyone could help, thanks.

replies.body:
Oh snap, tbh I'm pretty jealous of all of those skins!!

You're free to buy the new offers you have right now, but if you still want Reaper Soraka just hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We can still see the old offers, and should be able to make that transaction for you once you have the RP.
